author: fielding
msg: Point out that no path == absolute path in http.
Add a version flag to the IP literal address.
Replace hostname and all of its productions with reg-name and
the ability to percent-encode UTF-8 charcacters.

author: fielding
msg: ack initial reporter of last change

author: fielding
msg: Yet another rewrite of section 2 in response to comments from Martin Duerst.
Replaced "escape" with "percent-encoding" everywhere in response to
comments from Daniel Barclay.  Add references to RFC 2718 for John Klensin
and to RFC 2978 for Ira McDonald.  Move everything else related to
characters and ABNF for good measure.

author: fielding
msg: Many changes to the description of reserved and unreserved characters
in response to comments from Tim Berners-Lee and John Klensin.
Introduced gen-delims and sub-delims to simplify BNF.
The unsafe mark characters are moved to sub-delims.
Improved descrition of why suffix references are bad.
